TEXT.TITLE: BSN <BSN> HAS PURCHASED MACGREGOR <MGS> STOCK
TEXT.BODY: BSN Corp said it purchased MacGregor Sporting Goods' common stock in recent open market transactions. BSN said its position is less than the five pct ownership which would require specific disclosure. The company will continually review its position and may nelect to increase or decrease the number of shares owned, it added. Reuter
